- At the beginning of the Segment (within 1 second)

This is a demo file to test the new segment interrupt function.

Functions have been fixed to:

1. Use the current location of Audio Player to interrupt

2. Click the "âœ‚ï¸ interrupt" button to perform

3. Optional interrupt from Dropdown (3s, 4s, 5s, 10s)

4. Keep the old file name and add a new paragraph

5. The segment interrupt position is allowed at the beginning, the end or after the segment

How to use:

1. Click "ğŸ”Š convert" to create TTS

2. Audio broadcast to move to the location to interrupt:

- At the beginning of the Segment (within 1 second)

- At the end of Segment (within the last 1 second) â†’ rest after Segment

- In the middle of the segment â†’ the current after segment break

3. Click "âœ‚ï¸ Disconnect" to create a break according to the option

4. Click "ğŸ¬ Add video" to add new videos

5. Video will create 3 -second audio and old audio will remain the same

Specific examples:

- There are 10 audio segments

- Choose the 5th video (with a duration of 10s)

- Move to the end of the 5th video

- Click "âœ‚ï¸ Disconnect" â†’ Create a break after the 5th video

Expected results:

Recently, on social networks, mainly Tiktok, a series of screen videos appeared when playing games, but notably the comment voice came from celebrities. Some artists are cited such as Huong Giang, Bich Phuong, Phuong My Chi or Tiktokers such as Huy Forum, Poetry Nguyen, Jenny Huynh to analyze and comment on the game Lien Quan Mobile, Sports ...

However, no artist really voiced those videos, but used by the user to remove their voices. According to an account instructions, this person used a tool named Minimax to convert text into voice.

Minimax Techonology is a Chinese AI company, famous for its voice clicking (Voice Cloning) from a short recording. Minimax, along with some other platforms such as Openai TTS, Elevenlabs has lowered technical barriers, allowing people to create anyone's voice.

Minimax is backed by large corporations such as Tencent, Alibaba and many venture capital funds. The company's customers are in many industries, such as games, education, finance, and entertainment with the common purpose of voicing video games, sports highlight comments, grafting into comedy videos.
